name: Super Kingdoms
description:
Description

This is my entry to the Technically a Game Jam, with the theme "Like X but Y". Or in my case "Like Kingdoms and Castles but it's a 3D platformer". Hence the name Super Kingdoms, a mix of Kingdoms and Castles and Super Mario. 

Can you find all the red coins? And what's your fastest clear time?

Controls

Using a gamepad or other controller is recommended. X-box and playstation controllers should work, but have not been tested. 

ActionKeyboardGamepadMovementWASDLeft stick
JumpSpace barSouth buttonSprintShiftWest buttonCrouchcLeft/Right triggerIncrease volume]Decrease volume[Toggle mutem

Note: crouching and jumping can be combined for additional moves.

Credits

The game is solely made by me, Kelvin van Hoorn, aka Radagasd.
The graphics are based upon the game Kingdoms and Castles, by Lion Shield.
The gameplay is inspired by Super Mario 3D World, by Nintendo.

The following programmes have been used:

  • Unity 2020.3 URP
  • Blender
  • Krita
  • Waveform
